verses.verse: In the year<WH8141> that Tartan<WH8661> came<WH935> unto Ashdod,<WH795> (when Sargon<WH5623> the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> sent<WH7971> him,) and fought<WH3898> against Ashdod,<WH795> and took<WH3920> it;

At the same<WH1931> time<WH6256> spoke<WH1696> the LORD<WH3068> by<WH3027> Isaiah<WH3470> the son<WH1121> of Amoz,<WH531> saying,<WH559> Go<WH1980> and loose<WH6605> the sackcloth<WH8242> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> thy loins,<WH4975> and put off<WH2502> thy shoe<WH5275> from<WH4480> <WH5921> thy foot.<WH7272> And he did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> walking<WH1980> naked<WH6174> and barefoot.<WH3182>

And the LORD<WH3068> said,<WH559> Like as<WH834> my servant<WH5650> Isaiah<WH3470> hath walked<WH1980> naked<WH6174> and barefoot<WH3182> three<WH7969> years<WH8141> for a sign<WH226> and wonder<WH4159> upon<WH5921> Egypt<WH4714> and upon<WH5921> Ethiopia;<WH3568>

So <WH3651> shall the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> lead away<WH5090> <WH853> the Egyptians<WH4714> prisoners,<WH7628> and the Ethiopians<WH3568> captives,<WH1546> young<WH5288> and old,<WH2205> naked<WH6174> and barefoot,<WH3182> even with their buttocks<WH8357> uncovered,<WH2834> to the shame<WH6172> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And they shall be afraid<WH2865> and ashamed<WH954> of Ethiopia<WH4480> <WH3568> their expectation,<WH4007> and of<WH4480> Egypt<WH4714> their glory.<WH8597>

And the inhabitant<WH3427> of this<WH2088> isle<WH339> shall say<WH559> in that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> Behold,<WH2009> such<WH3541> is our expectation,<WH4007> whither<WH834> <WH8033> we flee<WH5127> for help<WH5833> to be delivered<WH5337> from<WH4480> <WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Assyria:<WH804> and how<WH349> shall we<WH587> escape?<WH4422>
